explains: vt. 给……穿上裤子；给……装上炮尾

sentences.en: The production time is only three percent baby remained breech.
sentences.cn: 生产的时候只有百分之三的宝宝仍然保持臀位。

sentences.en: The Asia survey found the procedure benefits babies during breech births.
sentences.cn: 本次亚洲研究发现，这种手术对于臀位分娩中的新生儿较为有利。

sentences.en: Then I got the bad news: the baby had turned breech and would need to be delivered by emergency Cesarean section.
sentences.cn: 接着我得到了坏消息：孩子已经臀位朝下，我需要采取剖腹产手术。
